types.name: Comment
types.description: Comments added to custom posts

types.name: GenericCustomPost
types.description: Any custom post, with or without its own type for the schema

types.name: Media
types.description: Media elements (such as images, videos, etc), attached to a post or independent

types.name: Menu
types.description: Representation of a navigation menu

types.name: MenuItem
types.description: Items (links, pages, etc) added to a menu

types.name: MutationRoot
types.description: Mutation type, starting from which mutations are executed

types.name: Page
types.description: Representation of a page

types.name: Post
types.description: Representation of a post

types.name: PostCategory
types.description: Representation of a category, added to a post

types.name: PostTag
types.description: Representation of a tag, added to a post

types.name: QueryRoot
types.description: Query type, starting from which the query is executed

types.name: Root
types.description: Root type, starting from which the query is executed

types.name: User
types.description: Representation of a user

types.name: UserAvatar
types.description: User avatar

types.name: UserRole
types.description: User roles

types.name: _DirectiveExtensions
types.description: Extensions (custom metadata) added to the directive

types.name: _EnumValueExtensions
types.description: Extensions (custom metadata) added to the enum value

types.name: _FieldExtensions
types.description: Extensions (custom metadata) added to the field

types.name: _InputValueExtensions
types.description: Extensions (custom metadata) added to the input value

types.name: _NamedTypeExtensions
types.description: Extensions (custom metadata) added to the GraphQL type (for all 'named' types: Object, Interface, Union, Scalar, Enum and InputObject)

types.name: _SchemaExtensions
types.description: Extensions (custom metadata) added to the GraphQL schema

types.name: __Directive
types.description: A GraphQL directive in the data graph

types.name: __EnumValue
types.description: Representation of an Enum value in GraphQL

types.name: __Field
types.description: Representation of a GraphQL type's field

types.name: __InputValue
types.description: Representation of an input object in GraphQL

types.name: __Schema
types.description: Schema type, to implement the introspection fields

types.name: __Type
types.description: Representation of each GraphQL type in the graph

types.name: AnyBuiltInScalar
types.description: Wildcard type representing any of GraphQL's built-in types (String, Int, Boolean, Float or ID)

types.name: Boolean
types.description: The Boolean scalar type represents `true` or `false`.

types.name: Date
types.description: Date scalar. It follows the ISO 8601 specification, with format "Y-m-d")

types.name: DateTime
types.description: DateTime scalar. It follows the ISO 8601 specification, with format "Y-m-d\TH:i:sP")

types.name: Email
types.description: Email scalar, such as leo@mysite.com

types.name: HTML
types.description:
HTML scalar, such as "

Hello world!

"

types.name: ID
types.description: The ID scalar type represents a unique identifier.

types.name: Int
types.description: The Int scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values.

types.name: JSONObject
types.description: Custom scalar representing a JSON Object of unrestricted shape

types.name: MenuLocationSelectableString
types.description: Menu Locations, with possible values: `""`.

types.name: Numeric
types.description: Wildcard type representing any of the numeric types (Int or Float)

types.name: String
types.description: The String scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences.

types.name: URL
types.description: URL scalar, such as https://mysite.com/my-fabulous-page

types.name: URLAbsolutePath
types.description: URL Absolute Path scalar, such as "/my-fabulous-page" in URL "https://mysite.com/my-fabulous-page". The absolute path starts with "/", followed by the URL relative path

types.name: Commentable
types.description: The entity can receive comments

types.name: IsCustomPost
types.description: Entities representing a custom post

types.name: Node
types.description: The fundamental fields that must be implemented by all objects

types.name: Queryable
types.description: Entities that can be queried through an URL

types.name: SupportingFeaturedImage
types.description: Fields concerning an entity's featured image

types.name: WithAuthor
types.description: Entities that have an author

types.name: WithMeta
types.description: Fields with meta values

types.name: CategoryPaginationInput
types.description: Input to paginate categories

types.name: CommentByInput
types.description: Oneof input to specify the property and data to fetch a comment

types.name: CommentMetaQueryInput
types.description: Filter by meta key and value. The key must be allowed access in the Settings. See: https://developer.wordpress.org/reference/classes/wp_meta_query/

types.name: CommentResponsePaginationInput
types.description: Input to paginate response comments

types.name: CommentResponsesFilterInput
types.description: Input to filter comment responses

types.name: CommentSortInput
types.description: Input to sort custom posts

types.name: CustomPostByInput
types.description: Oneof input to specify the property and data to fetch a custom post

types.name: CustomPostCategoriesFilterInput
types.description: Input to filter categories from a custom post

types.name: CustomPostCommentPaginationInput
types.description: Input to paginate custom post comments

types.name: CustomPostCommentsFilterInput
types.description: Input to filter comments from custom posts

types.name: CustomPostMetaQueryInput
types.description: Filter by meta key and value. The key must be allowed access in the Settings. See: https://developer.wordpress.org/reference/classes/wp_meta_query/

types.name: CustomPostPaginationInput
types.description: Input to paginate custom posts

types.name: CustomPostSortInput
types.description: Input to sort custom posts

types.name: CustomPostTagsFilterInput
types.description: Input to filter tags from a custom post

types.name: GenericCustomPostPaginationInput
types.description: Input to paginate generic custom posts

types.name: MediaItemByInput
types.description: Oneof input to specify the property and data to fetch a media item

types.name: MediaItemSortInput
types.description: Input to sort custom posts

types.name: MenuByInput
types.description: Oneof input to specify the property and data to fetch a menu

types.name: MenuSortInput
types.description: Input to sort custom posts

types.name: PageByInput
types.description: Oneof input to specify the property and data to fetch a page

types.name: PageChildrenFilterInput
types.description: Input to filter the page children

types.name: PagePaginationInput
types.description: Input to paginate pages

types.name: PostByInput
types.description: Oneof input to specify the property and data to fetch a post

types.name: PostCategoryByInput
types.description: Oneof input to specify the property and data to fetch a category

types.name: PostPaginationInput
types.description: Input to paginate posts

types.name: PostTagByInput
types.description: Oneof input to specify the property and data to fetch a tag

types.name: RootAddCommentToCustomPostFilterInput
types.description: Input to add a comment to a custom post

types.name: RootCategoriesFilterInput
types.description: Input to filter categories

types.name: RootCommentPaginationInput
types.description: Input to paginate comments

types.name: RootCommentsFilterInput
types.description: Input to filter comments

types.name: RootCreatePostFilterInput

types.name: RootCustomPostsFilterInput
types.description: Input to filter custom posts

types.name: RootGenericCustomPostsFilterInput
types.description: Input to filter generic custom posts

types.name: RootMediaItemPaginationInput
types.description: Input to paginate media items

types.name: RootMediaItemsFilterInput
types.description: Input to filter media items

types.name: RootMenuPaginationInput
types.description: Input to paginate menus

types.name: RootMenusFilterInput
types.description: Input to filter menus

types.name: RootMyCommentsFilterInput
types.description: Input to filter the logged-in user's comments

types.name: RootMyCustomPostsFilterInput
types.description: Input to filter the logged-in user's custom posts

types.name: RootMyPostsFilterInput
types.description: Input to filter the logged-in user's posts

types.name: RootPagesFilterInput
types.description: Input to filter pages

types.name: RootPostsFilterInput
types.description: Input to filter posts

types.name: RootRemoveFeaturedImageFromCustomPostFilterInput
types.description: Input to remove the featured image from a custom post

types.name: RootReplyCommentFilterInput
types.description: Input to add a comment to a custom post

types.name: RootSetCategoriesOnCustomPostFilterInput
types.description: Input to set categories on a custom post

types.name: RootSetFeaturedImageOnCustomPostFilterInput
types.description: Input to set the featured image on a custom post

types.name: RootSetTagsOnCustomPostFilterInput
types.description: Input to set tags on a custom post

types.name: RootTagsFilterInput
types.description: Input to filter tags

types.name: RootUpdatePostFilterInput
types.description: Input to update a custom post

types.name: TagPaginationInput
types.description: Input to paginate tags

types.name: TaxonomyMetaQueryInput
types.description: Filter by meta key and value. The key must be allowed access in the Settings. See: https://developer.wordpress.org/reference/classes/wp_meta_query/

types.name: TaxonomySortInput
types.description: Input to sort custom posts

types.name: TaxonomyTaxonomiesFilterInput
types.description: Input to filter child taxonomies

types.name: UserByInput
types.description: Oneof input to specify the property and data to fetch a user

types.name: UserCustomPostsFilterInput
types.description: Input to filter the user's custom posts

types.description: Filter by meta key and value. The key must be allowed access in the Settings. See: https://developer.wordpress.org/reference/classes/wp_meta_query/

types.description: Input to paginate users

types.name: UserSearchByInput
types.description: Oneof input to specify the property and data to search users

types.name: MetaQueryCompareByArrayValueOperator
types.description: Operators to compare against an array value

types.description: Operators to compare against the meta key

types.description: Operators to compare against a numeric value

types.name: MetaQueryCompareByStringValueOperator
types.description: Operators to compare against a string value

types.name: MetaQueryValueTypesEnum
types.description: Custom field type

types.name: RelationEnum
types.description: The logical relationship between array values in query args (for meta query, date parameters, and others) when there is more than one

types.name: CustomPostUnion
types.description: Union of 'custom post' type resolvers
